## Pool.fetchTemporalTextureCube() method

Fetch a temporal Cube texture from the object pool.

**Signature:**

```typescript
fetchTemporalTextureCube(autoRelease: boolean, format: TextureFormat, size: number, mipmapping?: boolean): TextureCube;
```
